department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Post Brush: Studio Course
course.description: Using the silkscreen printing process, students will create paintings and objects that incorporate images and text found in popular culture. Through slides, videos and informal discussions, students will be introduced to the Pop artists of the 20th century as well as other contemporary artists.
course.prerequisites: At least one VES studio half-course or permission of the instructor.
